'''Dango Milk''' is a [[food]] item that the player can purchase from [[Tomoki]] in [[Inazuma City]] for 1,500 [[Mora]] (max 2 per day). This item is only available after completing {{Quest|Reflections of Mortality}}.

Dango Milk restores '''26'''% of Max HP to the selected character and regenerates '''570''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
